message: Let's start with a fair split. Accept and we can end the game.
You're being too generous, I'll take a bit more.
You're being greedy, I'll give you a bit more, but not too much.
You're getting closer, but I'm not there yet.
I'm not getting any younger, I need a better deal now.
I'm starting to think you're not serious about getting a good deal.

I'm not going to let you get the upper hand so easily.
I'm not going to let you walk all over me. This is my final offer.
I'm not backing down, you'll have to do better than that.

You should have taken the deal when you had the chance. Now you're getting nothing.
